entry.source: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}...That's what I was gonna ask you.{F801}{F802}I'm surprised you came to Ikebukuro{F801}on your own. I mean, It's not like{F801}she told you to.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}...That's what I was gonna ask you.{F801}{F802}I'm surprised you came to Ikebukuro{F801}on your own. I mean, It's not like{F801}she told you to.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}Ikebukuro is a bad place for people{F801}who live in Tokyo. It's crawling with{F801}foreign demons!{F801}{F802}But it's funny...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}Ikebukuro is a bad place for people{F801}who live in Tokyo. It's crawling with{F801}foreign demons!{F801}{F802}But it's funny...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}It was the reign of demons, who devour{F801}humans, which protected books from{F801}that man.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}It was the reign of demons, who devour{F801}humans, which protected books from{F801}that man.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}Are you implying that there are books{F801}here...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}Are you implying that there are books{F801}here...?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}Then I might finally read the rest of{F801}that manga...! Oh, ah... pardon me.{F801}{F802}The Black Samurai who smuggled books{F801}into our kingdom may be supplying{F801}them here as well.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Isabeau\0{F87A,5}Then I might finally read the rest of{F801}that manga...! Oh, ah... pardon me.{F801}{F802}The Black Samurai who smuggled books{F801}into our kingdom may be supplying{F801}them here as well.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}You traveled all this way only to{F801}tell us that much?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}You traveled all this way only to{F801}tell us that much?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}That's right!{F801}{F802}I said I was interested in you guys,{F801}didn't I?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}That's right!{F801}{F802}I said I was interested in you guys,{F801}didn't I?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}Okay, I'll be going now. I hope we{F801}meet again!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Hikaru\0{F87A,20}Okay, I'll be going now. I hope we{F801}meet again!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}That sounds like my cue, Master.{F801}{F802}The quest to "Capture the Black{F801}Samurai"...{F801}{F802}Looks like it's going well.{F801}I'll keep rooting for you.{F801}
